DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy 6 % Hydrogen Peroxide Tooth Bleaching Agent
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , triple-blinded ( patient , evaluator , statistician ) , split-mouth design ( one hemiarcade treat 1 compound ) follow nonprobability sample . The patient invite participate study poster post around city recruit participant study department , contact email phone . A total 131 patient examined dental chair check meet inclusion exclusion criterion . The patient include study 18 year old select follow inclusion criterion : anterior teeth without restoration , previous bleaching procedure , cervical lesion , dental pain . Patients pregnant lactating , moderate severe fluorosis , tetracycline stain , orthodontic treatment , periodontal disease , orofacial tumor , trauma , tooth malformation , take analgesic , anti-inflammatory , antibiotic drug exclude . Two trained operator ( restorative dentistry professor ) perform bleach treatment . A third participant contact patient responsible conduct randomization . The allocation hemiarcade group perform random draw use Microsoft Excel 2010 ( Microsoft , Redmond , Washington , USA ) coding assign participant . There two experimental group : Group A act control , hydrogen peroxide whiten compound apply concentration 35 % upper hemiarcade . Group B experimental group , upper hemiarcade treat 6 % compound catalyze titanium oxide nanoparticles activate blue hybrid light infrared laser . The distribution operator make block randomization . To ensure triple blinding , follow procedure adopt : 1 ) label , logo , packaging , aspect could identify product remove , procedures instrument standardize ; 2 ) bleaching protocol perform different room evaluator examine patient ; 3 ) randomization alpha-numerically coded ensure blind research team ; 5 ) statistician receive data tabulate code allow identification treatment apply group . Sample size calculation The primary outcome study efficacy determine color alteration ( ΔE ) . Previous study show use in-office bleaching agent contain 35 % hydrogen peroxide ( HP35 ) without LED/Laser light lead ΔE value 7.0-2.0 two bleaching session . In order 80 % chance detect significance level 5 % , consider increase primary outcome measure 7 control group 5 experimental group , minimum 16 participant would require group . Due high dropout rate last two clinical study research group , decide add 80 % patient , lead 30 patient group . Bleaching protocol In session , volunteer receive prophylaxis pumice powder water . Then , gingival tissue protect use light-cured resin gum barrier apply accord manufacturer 's instruction ( Lase Protect - DMC , São Carlos , SP , Brazil ) . The resultant gel distribute uniformly upper hemiarcade surface teeth . A total 8 teeth first premolar bleach patient . In bleach session , bleach gel apply twice 12 minute . In application , surface gel light activate continuous irradiance 12 minute use LED/laser light total power 1800 mW ( Whitening Lase Plus - DMC Equipamentos , São Carlos , SP , Brazil ) . Three bleach session complete patient , interval session 7 day . Efficacy evaluation ( E ) Objective evaluation Two calibrated evaluator ( Kappa=0.85 ) use measure tooth color baseline ( T0 ) , immediately first ( T1 ) , second ( T2 ) , third session ( T3 ) , one week ( T4 ) one month third session ( T5 ) . The color evaluation obtain area 6 mm locate middle third labial surface leave right central incisor . To standardize evaluation , impression maxillary arch take make guide use high-putty silicone ( Zetaplus , Zhermack , Badia Polesine , Rovigo , Italy ) . A window create labial surface middle third central incisor use device well-formed border 3-mm radius correspond reflectance spectrophotometer ( Vita EasyShade Compact , VITA Zahnfabrik , Bad Säckingen , Germany ) . The shade determine use obtain parameter L* , a* , b* . The color alteration session give difference value obtain session baseline ( ∆E ) . ∆E calculate use follow formula : ΔE = [ ( ΔL* ) 2 + ( Δa* ) 2 + ( Δb* ) 2 ] 1/2 . Subjective evaluation For subjective evaluation , 16 tab shade guide ( Vita Classic , Vita Zahnfabrik ) arrange high ( B1 ) low ( C4 ) value .
